name: memori.es
description:
Your memories have become scattered, and you must rebuild history from the detritus of a lost world. memori.es is a story about loss and friendship. Can you and your robot friend put time back together (through a series of simple and arbitrary fetch quests)?


UPDATE (6.23.2021): Build now contains basic interaction modes and a Win state.  Stay tuned for sound effects, an actual level to play on, and a menu screen!


Controls:
WASD / Arrow Keys: Move
Space Bar: Interact
M: Map


Credits:
Devin Miller: Creative Direction, Project Management, Game Design, Programming & Visuals

Christa Paolucci: Art/Illustration, Character Design, Animation

Shane Fender: Music, Sound Design

Miranda Cooper: Game Design / Planning, UI

Reis Mahnic: Organization, Launch Support
